name: More... What!?
overview: A game by the well known, Andreas "Holy Moses / Role" Kwias, released in 2017. In this little roleplaying-game the main character got arrested in the year 1984 by some dark, evil forces. Help him/her to find the exit. The first player who can find the exit will be the most popular commodore 64 hero forever! If you have found the exit, post the name of the main-character as they will tell you then.
